Label: Equator-S Electron Drift Instrument Prime Parameters - G. Paschmann (MPE)

VariableDescription.Name: V_ed_xyz_gse%eq_pp_edi
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         ISTP Equator-S>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Equator-S
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#     VALIDITY                        To Be Validated
#     VALIDATOR                       TO BE OVERWRITTEN
#     CAVEATS                         See also `TEXT' global attr. for Caveats file location
#     STATUS_KEY                      Status[0]= 0 = Bad data
#                                     Status[0]= 1 = Use with caution
#                                     Status[0]= 2 = OK
#                                     Status[0]= 255 = Not Supplied
#     SOURCE_NAME                     EQ>Equator-S
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 Spin averages
#     DATA_TYPE                       PP>Prime Parameter
#     DESCRIPTOR                      EDI>Electron Drift Instrument
#     PI_NAME                         G. Paschmann
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  MPE
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Electric Fields (space)
#     DATA_VERSION                    TO BE OVERWRITTEN
#     TITLE                           Electron Drift Velocity and Electric Field>Spin averages
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 EQ_PP_EDI
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  EQ_PP_EDI
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Equator-S Electron Drift Instrument Prime Parameters
#     TEXT                            see EQS-MPE-EDC-01, Equator-S Data Center Manual, section 4.2 EDI
#     MODS                            Produced in accordance with ESDS file specification
#                                     Reference Document for CSDS CDF File Design, DS-QMW-TN-0003
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0301
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 Refer to ESDS for rules of acknowledgement
#     GENERATED_BY                    Generated by EDC, MPE-Garching, Germany
#     GENERATION_DATE                 TO BE OVERWRITTEN
#     INST_MODE                       TO BE OVERWRITTEN
#     PARENTS                         TO BE OVERWRITTEN
#     RULES_OF_USE                    Refer to  EQS-MPE-EDC-01
#     SKELETON_VERSION                EDC_SKT_V3.0
#     INST_SETTINGS                   TO BE OVERWRITTEN
#     SOFTWARE_VERSION                TO BE OVERWRITTEN
#     VALIDATE                        Compatible with the ISTP CDF Standards
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Equator-S_EDI_Prime-Parameters-PP_4sec-Spin-Resolution_cdf
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Interval centered time tag rounded to nearest msecond
#  2. Drift velocity, vector GSE
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 18:45:44 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#
EPOCH                               V_ED_X_GSE             V_ED_Y_GSE             V_ED_X_GSE
                                  (@_x (GSE)_)           (@_y (GSE)_)           (@_z (GSE)_)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                    km/s                   km/s                   km/s
25-03-1998 21:53:13.500                1.54472               -1.81105                1.22512
